column2: "Na Sobal ne ba Reaia woo Jahat; na Jahat woo Ahumai na Lahad. Woyinom nye Zoratfo ebusuafo."
"Na woyinom nye Etam n’egya ne mba; Jezreel
column4: na Idbash: na hɔn akyerɛbaa ne dzin dze Hazelelponi:"

column3: na Husa so n’egya nye Ezer. Woyinom nye Bɛtlɛhɛm n’egya Efrata

column2: "Na Tekoa n’egya Ashur wɔ yernom beenu

column5: na Haahastari maa no. Woyinom nye Naara ne mba."

column4: na Harum ne ba Aharhel n’ebusuafo."

column2: "Na Jabez nyaa enyimnyam seen no nuanom: na ne na frɛɛ ne dzin Jabez

column4: Ao nkyɛ edze nhyira ara eehyira me
column7: na nkyɛ eesie me efi mbusu ho
column8: ama ɔaammfa ɔhaw ammbrɛ me! Na Nyankopɔn maa no dza obisae no."

column2: "Na Suha no nua Kelub woo Mehir a ɔyɛ Eston n’egya no."

column4: na Ir-nahas n’egya Tehinna. Woyinom nye Reeka nkorɔfo."

column3: na Seraia: na Otiniel ne mba nye; Hatat na Meonotai."

column2: "Na Meonotai woo Ofra: na Seraia woo Ge-harasim n’egya Joab; nna wɔyɛ edwimfo."
"Na Jefune ne ba Kaleb ne mba nye; Iru
column4: na Naam: na Ela woo Kenaz."

column2: "Na ne yer Judanyi no woo Gedor n’egya Jered
column4: na Zanoa n’egya Jekutiel. Na woyinom nye Farao ne babaa Bitia a Mered faa no waar no no ne mba."

column5: na Tilon. Na Isi ne mba nye; Zohet

column2: "Juda ne ba Sela ne mba nye; Leka n’egya Er
column4: na hɔn a wɔdze ndwera fɛɛfɛw dzi edwin hɔn fie ebusuafo

column5: na Saraf a ɔwaree wɔ Moab
column6: na wɔasan aba Lehem no. (Dɛm nsɛm yi yɛ dza wɔakyerɛw no tsetse ato hɔ.)"

column3: Netaim na Gedera ekuromfo: hɔn na wɔnye ɔhen no tsenae wɔ n’edwuma no ntsi."

column2: "Na Simei nyaa mbabanyin duesia na mbabaa esia; na no nuanom no dze woennya mba pii
column3: nkyii so hɔn ebusua nyinara anndɔr

column5: na Saaraim. Iyinom nye hɔn nkurow dze bodu David n’ahendzi do."

column2: "na hɔn nkuroba nyinara wɔabɔ nkurow no ara ho aprɔw dze kodu Baal. Iyinom nye hɔn tsenabew
column3: na wɔwɔ hɔn ebusuasantsen nwoma da hɔ."

column2: "woyinom a wɔabobɔ hɔn edzin yi wɔyɛ mbapɔmba wɔ hɔn ebusua ebusua mu: na hɔn egyanom efiefi trɛɛ kɛsenara."
"Na wosii mu kɔr mbrɛ wɔnam kɔ Gedor ahɛnee
column3: mekyerɛ ɔbɔn no no boka afamu
column4: dɛ wɔrokɔhwehwɛ edzidzibea ama hɔn nguankuw."
no do dwe komm; na hɔn a nkyɛ nkan no wɔtsetse hɔ no wofi Ham mu."

column2: "Na woyinom a wɔabobɔ hɔn edzin akyerɛw no bae wɔ Judahen Hezekia ne nda no mu
column3: na wɔkɛsɛɛ hɔn asesee na Meunim a wohun no hɔ no
column6: na wɔtsenatsenaa hɔn ananmu: osiandɛ edzidzibea wɔ hɔ ma hɔn nguankuw."

column5: sii mu kɔr bepɔw Seir do

column2: "Na wokunkum Amalekfo nkaa a wofii nsa guanee no
column3: na wɔtsenaa hɔ dze bodu ndɛ da yi."
